title: CryptoGM
author: CryptoGM
content: Hello,At coinweez.com we invite crypto projects who would love to place web banner ads with us. We are a crypto and blockchain-focused hub spot with impressive traffic stats. Traffic on our sites mainly are from the following leading crypto markets; USA, China, Singapore, Canada Estonia, Vietnam, Dubai, Nigeria and Kenya.Options available:1. Top header banner ad - $1000 covering a 3-month period2. Side banner ad - $550 covering a 3 month periodContact us via email contact@coinweez.com or add on Telegram @ICO_Services orÂ  https://t.me/ICO_ServicesWe also offer publishing press releases at a cost of $300. If you need a writer to help with the PR writing this attracts an extra cost of $150 per PR.
